text: Remove the "Project description" from settings and new project creation flow, including deleting it from API routes and data stores (no backwards compatibility required)

proposedTasks.title: Remove project description from backend API and data stores
proposedTasks.description:
Remove the `description` field from the Project entity across all backend layers.

- Remove `description` from the Project type/interface definition
- Remove `description` from the project creation API route (POST /projects) request schema and handler
- Remove `description` from the project update/settings API route (PATCH /projects/:id) request schema and handler
- Remove `description` from the GET /projects and GET /projects/:id response payloads
- Remove `description` from the project index file (~/.opensprint/projects.json) schema and any read/write logic
- Remove `description` from any in-memory project index or cache structures
- No migration or backwards compatibility needed â€” existing stored `description` values can be silently ignored or stripped

Acceptance criteria:
- No API route accepts or returns a `description` field for projects
- Project creation succeeds without a `description` field
- Existing projects load without error even if they have a stale `description` in stored JSON
- All backend tests updated to remove `description` references; all tests pass

proposedTasks.title: Remove project description from frontend settings and creation wizard
proposedTasks.description:
Remove all UI elements and frontend state related to project description.

- Remove the description input field from the Project Setup Wizard (step 1: 'Project name and description')
- Update wizard step 1 heading/copy to reflect name-only input (e.g., 'Project name')
- Remove the description field from project settings / edit project UI
- Remove `description` from any frontend form state, validation, Redux/store slices, and API call payloads
- Remove `description` from the home screen project cards if displayed
- Remove `description` from the project switcher dropdown if displayed

Acceptance criteria:
- No UI anywhere shows a project description input or display
- Project creation wizard works end-to-end without description
- Project settings page works without description
- Home screen project cards render without description
- All frontend tests updated; all tests pass
